column9: This medication did not work for me! Prior to taking it my only symptom was an increase in discharge. I delt with the side effects because I wanted the infection to clear up... however that did not happen!

column9: Unfortunately it has not worked for me.  Looking into other options.  Also important to note that I had a severe rection to alcohol use with this drug.  Do not have alcoholic drink, use mouthwash, or anything containing alcohol on skin. Swelling occured in tongue, lips, and oral glands.

column2: 35-44 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I feel better after the 5th doses and I two doses per day due to severe infection.  After the 5th dose, I feel tired but the itchy seems to be cure.  I wash myself two to three times a day to avoid too much moisture and hope that this can prevent yeast infection.  I am on my 6th dose and believe this medicine cure my infection.

column2: diehardangelfan, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Patient)
column9: I agree with most of the previous reviews. It was prescribed for 5 days but I kept using it for 4 more days. It seemed to work. But after just 3 days of non-use, the infection seemed to be back. I used it again for a couple of days. But infection was still there. Irritation in the pubic area and discharge. I would not recommend this drug for a vaginal infection.

column2: Irritated, 35-44 Female  on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I have been on and off this medication for almost a year.  The infection does clear up but it comes back again and again. This is very irritating.  It is only effective for a couple of weeks (if that) then the infection is back again. I am tired of the watery discharge and the odor.  There has to be something out there that is effective in clearing this infection up for good.
